Active Aggression.name: Active Aggression
Active Aggression.effect: While in play, this Thought or Group must declare an engagement every turn if able.

Active Power-amp.name: Active Power-amp
Active Power-amp.effect: While in play, increase the Power all of your own Thoughts in play by 4.

Challenger Power-up.name: Challenger Power-up
Challenger Power-up.effect: While resolving an engagement, the Power of this Thought doubles.

Challenger Thought-Eater.name: Challenger Thought-Eater
Challenger Thought-Eater.effect: While resolving an engagement, you may remove any number of Thoughts you control to increase the Power of this Thought by the total Power of the discarded Thought(s).

Direct-challenge Power-up.name: Direct-challenge Power-up
Direct-challenge Power-up.effect: While engaging a card with a Break Point higher than the Power of this Thought, the Power of this Thought triples.

End-turn Disengage.name: End-turn Disengage
End-turn Disengage.effect: When a turn ends, Disengage this Thought or Group.

End-turn Discard.name: End-turn Discard
End-turn Discard.effect: When a turn ends, remove this card from play.

Engaged Penalty.name: Engaged Penalty
Engaged Penalty.effect: While Engaged, you may only Disengage this Thought or Group, at the begining of your turn, by removing one other Thought you control.

Post-challenge Discard.name: Post-challenge Discard
Post-challenge Discard.effect: When this card resolves an engagement, remove it from play.

Post-challenge Pluck.name: Post-challenge Pluck
Post-challenge Pluck.effect: When this card resolves an engagement, discard the top card of a target deck.

Removed Recollection.name: Removed Recollection
Removed Recollection.effect: When this card is removed from play, you may play a Thought from your discard pile with less cost.

Removed Pluck.name: Removed Pluck
Removed Pluck.effect: When this card is removed from play, discard the top card of a target deck.

Thoughtless Recollect.name: Thoughtless Recollect
Thoughtless Recollect.effect: When you have no other Thoughts in play, this card may be played from the Discard pile on your turn.

Elusive Thought.name: Elusive Thought
Elusive Thought.effect: When this card is played from your hand, immediately remove it from play.

Foreboding Sacrafice.name: Foreboding Sacrafice
Foreboding Sacrafice.effect: When this Thought or Group would be removed, you may instead discard the top five cards of your deck.

Foreboding Engagement.name: Foreboding Engagement
Foreboding Engagement.effect: When this card resolves an engagement, discard the top three cards of your deck.

Thoughtless Recollect.name: Thoughtless Recollect
Thoughtless Recollect.effect: When you have no other Thoughts in play, this card may be played from the Discard pile on your turn.

Discard Power-up.name: Discard Power-up
Discard Power-up.effect: Increase the Power of this card by 2 for every card in target Thinker's discard pile.

Removed Amnesia.name: Removed Amnesia
Removed Amnesia.effect: When this card is removed from play, discard the top 3 cards of target Thinker's deck.

Sacrafice Amnesia.name: Sacrafice Amnesia
Sacrafice Amnesia.effect: When is card is played, you remove one of your own Thoughts in play and discard the top 3 cards of target Thinker's deck.

Amnesia Engagement.name: Amnesia Engagement
Amnesia Engagement.effect: When this card resolves an engagement, discard the top card of target Thinker's deck.

Removed Discard.name: Removed Discard
Removed Discard.effect: When this card is removed from play, all Thinkers must discard 1 card from their hand.
